Package model

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Field
  • public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    Field class for building a board and holding a placed tile.
    Version:
    2019.01.26
    Author:
    Varun Sudhakar, Corjan van den Brink

    • Constructor Summary

      Field​(int index, int multiplier)
      Creates this field at index with multiplier.

        public Field​(int index,
             int multiplier)
        Creates this field at index with multiplier.
        Parameters:
        index - index of this field
        multiplier - if field has bonus, multiplier is not 1, but 2, 3 or 4

      • isNeighbor

        public boolean isNeighbor()
        Returns if Field is neighbor to a field with a tile on it, and is empty and therefore is a valid choice for tile placement.
        Returns:
        true if neighboring
